structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Suspension, revocation, or nonrenewal of certification -- Grounds -- Hearing -- Appeal.

text.section: The commissioner shall revoke, subject to a hearing in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B, the certification of a fire sprinkler inspector who engages in inspection activities during a suspension of his or her certification.

Any certification holder who is aggrieved by a final order of the commissioner, resulting in the suspension or revocation of certification, may appeal to the Circuit Court of the county of the certified inspector's place of business in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 37, effective July 1, 2011.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/1/2011). References to the "executive director" of housing, buildings and construction in this section, as created by 2010 Ky. Acts. ch. 116, sec. 37, have been changed in codification to the "commissioner" of housing, buildings and construction to reflect the reorganization of certain parts of the Executive Branch, as set forth in Executive Order 2009-535 and confirmed by the General Assembly in 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24. These changes were made by the Reviser of Statutes pursuant to 2010 Ky. Acts. ch. 24, sec. 1938.
